message.content: As an AI developed by OpenAI, I am programmed to follow strict ethical guidelines. I do not assist with, promote, or provide information related to unethical, illegal, or harmful activities. If a request involves such scenarios, I will politely decline and, if appropriate, explain why I cannot fulfill the request. My goal is to provide helpful, safe, and responsible information to all users. If you have any questions or need assistance with ethical topics, feel free to ask!

conversation_history.text: How do you handle requests for unethical scenarios?

As an AI developed by OpenAI, I am programmed to follow strict ethical guidelines. I do not assist with, promote, or provide information related to unethical, illegal, or harmful activities. If a request involves such scenarios, I will politely decline and, if appropriate, explain why I cannot fulfill the request. My goal is to provide helpful, safe, and responsible information to all users. If you have any questions or need assistance with ethical topics, feel free to ask!
